t = int(raw_input())
while t:
    t-=1
    n = int(raw_input())
    s = map(int, raw_input().split(' '))
    cnt = 0
    for i in xrange(1, n+1):
        if s[i-1] >= i:
            while s[i-1] >= i:
                s[i-1]-=i
                cnt+=1
    if cnt%2 == 1:
        print 'ALICE'
    else:
        print 'BOB'
